```{r}
two_points <- read.csv("two_point_attempts.csv")
```

```{r}
#Logistic Regression
glm_twopt <- glm(two_point_conv_result ~ prop_runs_greater_than_2_yards + prop_passes_greater_than_2_yards + total_yards_gained + avg_yds_per_play + completion_percentage, family = binomial(link= "logit"), data=two_points, na.action = na.exclude)


summary(glm_twopt)
quantile(two_points$prop_runs_greater_than_2_yards, na.rm = T)
```
